europeana:record.dc:title: Material of the rhopalid genera Leptocoris Hahn, 1833, and Boisea Kirkaldy, 1910 (Heteroptera) from the collection of the Nationaal Natuurhistorisch Museum at Leiden, The Netherlands
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Gollner-Scheiding U.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Heteroptera; Rhopalidae; Leptocoris Hahn
1833; Boisea Kirkaldy
1910; Regions: IndoAustralian
Afrotropical; taxonomy
europeana:record.dc:description: Indo-Australian and Afrotropical material of the rhopalid genera Leptocoris Hahn, 1833, and Boisea Kirkaldy, 1910 of the Nationaal Natuurhistorisch Museum at Leiden has been listed, Leptocoris fusca spec. nov. from Timor (Indonesia) is described, and its male genital characters are figured.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Material of the rhopalid genera Leptocoris Hahn, 1833, and Boisea Kirkaldy, 1910 (Heteroptera) from the collection of the Nationaal Natuurhistorisch Museum at Leiden, The Netherlands (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 66) (Issue 14)
